name: sometimes we just want someone to talk to, sometimes we don't
name_original: sometimes we just want someone to talk to, sometimes we don't
description:
Take control as one of the land's f a r m e r -- plant a seed and talk to it as it grows. Help improve the lives of folks.... or don't?

Multiple endings to be experienced :)

the game runs faster on windows (than on web) so if you're playing on windows, you might wanna download it 

Controls

WASD - Movement, select dialogue option

E - Talk, confirm dialogue option

Esc - Menu for restarting or going back to main menu

Credits

characters - https://pvgames.itch.io/mythos-reawakening

hellhound - https://iknowkingrabbit.itch.io/heroic-creature-pack

flower - https://josephseraph.itch.io/sc-monster-pack-1

background music - https://www.twitch.tv/kpu4you

============================================

My entry for: https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-game-jam-6

Challenges:

Extra Historian -- Setting was based on Angkor Wat

Extra Distance -- You can't get near other people!

============================================

Extra Credit is the reason why I decided to go to undergrad for game development

i've learned so much since then and i wanted to show my appreciation of Extra Credit somehow
